item.title: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth trilogy and Death end re;Quest: Code Z for Switch canceled for the west
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/hyperdimension-neptunia-rebirth-trilogy-and-death-end-request-code-z-for-switch-canceled-for-the-west

  • Switch

Contents 'do not comply with the Nintendo Guidelines.'

The Switch versions of Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1, Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation, Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3: V Generation, and Death end re;Quest: Code Z will no longer be released in the west due to the contents “not complying with the Nintendo Guidelines,” publisher Idea Factory International announced.

In Japan, the Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth for Switch launched both physically and digitally on May 23. A western release was originally planned for May 21, but delayed indefinitely.

Death end re;Quest Code Z launched for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on September 19 in Japan. Idea Factory International clarified that the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions will still launch in the west in 2025 as planned.
